data.title: Bitter Ocampo (new)
data.meta_description:
I deleted the previous upload as the fugly hair was bugging me. Here's a reworked version.
	
	Diether Ocampo is a well-known (well, maybe, five years ago?) Filipino actor. Bitter Ocampo is a play on his name, a term that probably originated from the local gay community. I have no idea if the idea behind this moniker is simply because it's phonetically sound or because he and Kristine Hermosa have broken up. Haha. Anyway, this is my take on Bitter Ocampo.
data.text:
I deleted the previous upload as the fugly hair was bugging me. Here's a reworked version.

Diether Ocampo is a well-known (well, maybe, five years ago?) Filipino actor. Bitter Ocampo is a play on his name, a term that probably originated from the local gay community. I have no idea if the idea behind this moniker is simply because it's phonetically sound or because he and Kristine Hermosa have broken up. Haha. Anyway, this is my take on Bitter Ocampo.
